description: Scores contain the scored forecasts from the terrestrial forecast theme. These are summarized and scored versions of the raw forecast output. The raw forecasts are located in the 'Forecasts' collection.
title: TERN Terrestrial Flux Forecast Scores

table_columns.name: site_id
table_columns.description: For forecasts that are not on a spatial grid, use of a site dimension that maps to a more detailed geometry (points, polygons, etc.) is allowable. In general this would be documented in the external metadata (e.g., a look-up table that provides lon and lat); however in netCDF this could be handled by the CF Discrete Sampling Geometry data model.

table_columns.name: datetime
table_columns.description: ISO 8601(ISO 2019) datetime the forecast starts from (a.k.a. issue time); Only needed if more than one reference_datetime is stored in asingle file. Forecast lead time is thus datetime-reference_datetime. Ina hindcast the reference_datetime will be earlier than the time the hindcast was actually produced (see pubDate in Section 3). Datetimes are allowed to be earlier than the reference_datetime if a reanalysis/reforecast is run before the start of the forecast period. This variable was called start_time before v0.5 of the EFI standard.

table_columns.name: family
table_columns.description: For ensembles: “ensemble.” Default value if unspecified. For probability distributions: Name of the statistical distribution associated with the reported statistics. The “sample” distribution is synonymous with “ensemble.” For summary statistics: “summary.” If this dimension does not vary, it is permissible to specify familyas avariable attribute if the file format being used supports this (e.g.,netCDF).

table_columns.name: pubDate
table_columns.description: Datetime that forecasts was submitted to the forecast submission system.

table_columns.name: mean
table_columns.description: mean forecast prediction for all ensemble members

table_columns.name: sd
table_columns.description: standard deviation of all enemble member forecasts

table_columns.name: quantile97.5
table_columns.description: upper 97.5 percentile value of ensemble member forecasts

table_columns.name: quantile02.5
table_columns.description: upper 2.5 percentile value of ensemble member forecasts

table_columns.name: quantile90
table_columns.description: upper 90 percentile value of ensemble member forecasts

table_columns.name: quantile10
table_columns.description: upper 10 percentile value of ensemble member forecasts

table_columns.name: date
table_columns.description: ISO 8601(ISO 2019) date being predicted; follows CF convention http://cfconventions.org/cf-conventions/cf-conventions.html#time-coordinate.
